ygData.subject: Re: clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: Jojo isn t that high of a monster, I remember running into him many of times when I played a Troll Shaman.  I was told by many he was maybe Lvl 10-15 but it s
ygData.messageBody:
Jojo isn't that high of a monster, I remember running into him many of times
when I played a Troll Shaman. I was told by many he was maybe Lvl 10-15 but
it's been a long time since then and I'm not 100% sure of his lvl but it
didn't seem to high. Never killed him (yet) but he is on my hit list.

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 24 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> actually, i have seen him killed, and was given the pelt from him....it's
> lore....the name's <i think> a large kobold pelt or something like
> that...he's not hard to kill, just has alot of hp.....my druid was i think
> 32 or around there, and took him down with a few combusts
>
> (\/)ystix
>
> Curtis Bennett wrote:
>
> > From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> >
> > Someone asked to keep the posts coming, so here goes. :) slow day at
> > work for me, too.
> >
> > There are a couple of quests that have always intrigued me that appear
> > to be broken. One is the Jojongua pelt quest in Felwithe.
> > Technically, I guess, this is a Paladin quest, but the Paladin that
> > initiates it, asks if you will help the "clerics of tunare" so it
> > kind of overlaps.
> > >From what I have heard, Jojongua, the named Kobold in Innothule Swamp,
> > is a rare spawn, and those that have killed him, have never ever
> > looted a pelt off his cold, dead body. Also from what I have heard,
> > the corpse remains, even though there is no loot, and doesn't go away
> > after looting. Anyone have any information on this quest?
>
> > Ergo Soulhealer
> > test server
